label: SubordinateLineTradeSettlement
comment: The information, at a subordinate line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

objectProperties.comment: The code, specifying the direction, either an addition or subtraction, for the amount of this subordinate line trade settlement.
A tax applicable to this subordinate line trade settlement.
The billing period specified for the subordinate line of this trade settlement.
An invoice document referenced for this subordinate line trade settlement.
A purchase accounting account specified for the subordinate line of this trade settlement.
An allowance or charge specified for this subordinate line trade settlement.
A financial adjustment specified for this subordinate line trade settlement.

referencedBy.comment: A trade settlement specified for this subordinate trade line item.
